class User
  def name
    [first, last].join(' ') 
  end
end



var validator = new FormValidator('test',[
  {
    name:'required',
    display:'Required',
    rules:'required'
  },
  {
    name:'email',
    display:'Email',
    rules:'required|valid_email'
  },
  {
    name:'pass',
    display:'Password',
    rules:'required|matches[passConf]'
  }],
  function(errors,event) {
      if ( errors.length > 0 ) {
        //handle errors
      }
  });
